reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very detailed and clear in explanations, though the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Inspiring lectures and genuinely cares about student success.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Good course material, but lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, makes learning enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Challenging projects but very rewarding, great at explaining difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Needs to update his materials, but fairly knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Wonderful insights into classical literature, very inspiring.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knows a lot, but classes can be better organized.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Great at making complex theories understandable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engages with all students and encourages thoughtful discussions.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Deeply philosophical and intellectually stimulating classes.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Good content, but the lectures could be more engaging.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Extremely helpful and provides fascinating fieldwork opportunities.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Practical and hands-on approach to teaching, very helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her passion for art history is contagious, love her classes!

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Solid teaching but the tests are unnecessarily hard.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Makes learning music theory fun and easy, very interactive classes.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but the presentations are quite dry.

reviews.subject: Medicine
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and supportive, but the course load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Incredible knowledge of environmental issues, very engaging.
